abilities.name: Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!’
abilities.rule: Each time an attack made by this model with its ’urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding **VEHICLE** units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Dok’s Toolz
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

abilities.name: Grot Orderly
abilities.rule:
Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Grot Orderly token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.*
